title: Utvecklare
description:
Är du en erfaren utvecklare med fokus på backend eller arbetar du i en liknande roll med passion för fordonsindustrin och innovativa tekniska lösningar? Då kan detta vara jobbet för dig!

**Kund** är ett ledande teknikkonsultbolag som verkar genom hela utvecklingscykeln – från systemering, arkitektur och design till implementation och verifiering. Här kombineras djup teknisk expertis med glädje och en trivsam arbetsmiljö. Företaget är globalt med huvudkontor i Sverige och spelar en avgörande roll i att stärka flera nationers försvarsförmåga. Som konsult får du möjlighet att arbeta inom olika branscher såsom industri, försvar, medtech, fordon och telekom.

  

Tjänsten är en direktrekrytering vilket innebär att rekryteringsprocessen sker genom Futuria People men du kommer anställas direkt hos kund.

 **Om tjänsten**  

I den här rollen kommer du att arbeta med utveckling och underhåll av backend-system i .NET, C#, Java, C och/eller C++. Din roll anpassas utefter din kompetens och dina önskemål hos kunden.

* Huvudfokus ligger inom fordonsindustrin, där du bidrar till utveckling och underhåll av serverdelar för applikationer och system som stödjer fordonsteknik och relaterade tjänster.
* Du kommer att skapa robusta, säkra och effektiva system som uppfyller de höga krav som ställs inom fordonsindustrin, med lösningar som integrerar både hårdvara och mjukvara.
* I tjänsten ingår även samarbete med frontendutvecklare, UX-designers och projektledare för att säkerställa en helhetslösning som möter kundens behov.
* Du kommer även arbeta i både agila och vattenfallsbaserade projekt, där du bidrar med din tekniska kompetens och lösningsorienterade arbetssätt.

  


  

**Vi söker dig som**

* Har minst 3+ års erfarenhet inom fordonsindustrin, e-handel, Medtech, Fintech, maskininlärning/deep learning eller liknande branscher.
* Har tidigare arbetat i roller som backendutvecklare, mjukvaruutvecklare, mjukvaruarkitekt, fullstackutvecklare eller liknande.
* Innehar relevant eftergymnasial utbildning (B.Sc.).

**Meriterande erfarenheter**


Meriterande är det om du har arbetat i något utav dessa system:

  

* Javascript
* Angular
* Typescript
* SQL
* Docker
* Kubernetes
* Linux
* Jira
* 

 Vi söker dig som är engagerad, lösningsorienterad och har en stark vilja att utvecklas inom teknikområdet.

 **Övrig information**

* Start: Enligt överenskommelse
* Omfattning: Heltid
* Placering: Göteborg
* Eventuella frågor besvaras av rekryteringskonsult Sofie Andersson:  

sofie@futuriapeople.se

  

Passar det här in på dig eller känner du någon som skulle passa bättre för jobbet? - Tipsa gärna!

  

Intervjuer sker löpande, välkommen med din ansökan idag!

 ***Futuria People*** *är rekryteringsföretaget som hjälper individer att ta nästa steg i sin karriär och företag att attrahera nya medarbetare. Genom uppsökande rekrytering och kvalitativ annonsering har vi hjälpt hundratals kandidater till ett nytt jobb och en mer stimulerande vardag.*

title: Java backendutvecklare sökes till Sundsvall, Umeå & Luleå!
description:
Hos **Knowit** i Sundsvall, Umeå eller Luleå får du inte bara möjligheten att arbeta med spännande projekt – du blir en del av en gemenskap där innovation, utveckling och laganda står i fokus. Som konsult hos oss får du tillgång till varierande uppdrag inom både privat och offentlig sektor, där du som person har möjlighet att forma framtidens system och drivs av att bygga starka kundrelationer. Tillsammans skapar vi vår gemensamma framtid och din kompetensutvecklingsplan.

**Är det dig vi söker?**


Vi tror att du är en positiv, engagerad och erfaren systemutvecklare som är nyfiken på ny teknik och trivs med att samarbeta med likasinnade. Du har:

* Några års erfarenhet av Javautveckling.
* En relevant högskole-/universitetsutbildning eller yrkeshögskola.
* Flytande kunskaper i svenska, både i tal och skrift.

**Vårt erbjudande till dig**


Vi erbjuder mer än bara ett jobb – vi erbjuder en trygg arbetsplats som inspirerar och stöttar dig i varje steg. Här får du:

* En anställning som inkluderar pension, försäkringar och kollektivavtal
* En arbetsplats som ser vikten av balans mellan arbete och fritid, jämställdhet och ett hållbart ledarskap.
* En arbetsplats som värderar initiativ och vidareutveckling.
* Möjlighet att arbeta med välkända kunder inom olika branscher.
* Kollegor som inte bara är kunniga utan också fantastiska att ha vid sin sida.
* Aktiviteter som stärker gemenskapen – allt från träningspass till roliga prova-på-aktiviteter.
* Fina förmåner, exempelvis friskvård och ledighet mellan jul och trettondagen tack vare vår förkortade arbetstid.


Våra medarbetare beskriver kulturen och kollegorna som det bästa med att jobba på Knowit. Hos oss är trivsel och utveckling lika viktigt som att leverera resultat.

**Ansök idag!**


För frågor om Knowit eller tjänsten, kontakta gärna Sandra Abremark, ansvarig konsultchef sandra.abremark@knowit.se

*Vi ser fram emot din ansökan – bli en del av Knowit och skapa framtiden tillsammans med oss!*

title: Frontend Developer på INTERSPORT – skapa sköna kundresor
description:
**Plats:** Göteborg / hybrid
  

**Team:** R&D  

**Typ:** Tillsvidareanställning
  

  

**Vill du jobba med modern** frontend, starka varumärken och ett team som brinner för att förbättra varje detalj i kundresan – både online och i butik? Då är du rätt för oss.
  

  

INTERSPORT och Löplabbet växer digitalt – och nu letar vi en frontendutvecklare som vill vara med och bygga upplevelser som är snabba, tillgängliga, snygga och konverterande. Vi jobbar med Next.js, React och Sanity – i små tvärfunktionella team där du är med från idé till färdig lösning.
  

  

Du kommer arbeta nära CRO-specialist, UX, backend och verksamheten – och det du bygger kommer användas av tusentals kunder, varje dag.
  

  

**Vad du kommer att göra hos oss:**
  

* Utveckla vår e-handel och digitala gränssnitt i Next.js + React
* Vara med och förbättra prestanda, tillgänglighet och användarupplevelse
* Jobba tillsammans med CRO/UX för att hitta och testa förbättringar
* Arbeta nära backendutvecklare för att koppla frontend mot vårt headless-CMS och API:er
* Utveckla komponenter och lösningar som funkar både för INTERSPORT och Löplabbet

  

**Vi tror att du:**
  

* Har jobbat några år med modern frontend – gärna i React/Next.js
* Har bra känsla för struktur, designsystem och tillgänglighet
* Gillar att samarbeta och ta ansvar – du gillar att få saker att hända
* Tycker det är kul när teknik möter affär, UX och kundbeteende
* Vill jobba i ett team där det är högt i tak och nära till skratt

  

**Det här gör rollen extra kul:**
  

* Du bygger för två starka varumärken – i rörelse
* Du påverkar både teknik, design och affär
* Du jobbar i ett team där alla är med och formar lösningarna
* Du får växa – både som utvecklare och i ansvar
* Du är med och bygger en plattform som utvecklas varje vecka

  

**Välkommen till INTERSPORT Tech. Vi bygger smart, vi bygger tillsammans – och vi bygger för verkligheten och framtiden.**

title: Backend Developer på INTERSPORT – bygg smart tech för...
description:
**Plats:** Göteborg / hybrid
  

**Team:** R&D – Tech & Platform
  

**Typ:** Tillsvidareanställning


**Vill du jobba nära affären – med lösningar som kopplar ihop kampanjer, sortiment, logistik och butik – samtidigt som du får möjlighet att bredda dig mot fullstack? Då har vi rollen för dig.**


På INTERSPORT bygger vi just nu framtidens sporthandel. Vårt R&D-team utvecklar digitala lösningar som håller ihop allt från e-handel till butik, från centrallager till kampanjverktyg – och vi söker nu en backendutvecklare som vill vara med på resan.


**Vi jobbar i en snabbrörlig miljö där teknik och affär går hand i hand.**
  

Vår stack består bland annat av .NET i backend, React/Next.js i frontend, Sanity som CMS, och integrationer mot ERP, WMS, PIM och ett växande martech-landskap. Vi utvecklar också egna interna system helt inhouse – till exempel för sortimentsplanering, kampanjhantering och beslutsstöd.


Du behöver inte kunna allt från start – det viktiga är att du är nyfiken, gillar att samarbeta och vill förstå hur teknik kan stötta affären på riktigt. Du kommer främst att jobba med backend och integrationer, men det finns gott om möjligheter att bredda dig mot fullstack om du vill.


**Vad du kommer att göra hos oss:**


* Utveckla interna system och integrationer i .NET – som stöttar vår kommersiella process från sortiment till leverans.
* Koppla ihop affärskritiska system som ERP, WMS, e-com, kampanj- och produktdata.
* Vara del av ett tvärfunktionellt team med utvecklare, CRO-specialist, Tech Delivery Specialist och Tech Project Lead.
* Jobba nära verksamheten – butik, marknad, e-com, logistik – och se direkt vad ditt arbete leder till.
* Bygga lösningar som är robusta idag och flexibla för framtiden.

**Vi tror att du:**


* Känner dig hemma med backendutveckling, gärna eventdrivet i .NET.
* Är van vid att bygga API:er, jobba med databaser och förstå systemintegrationer.
* Gillar att förstå helheter – affärsflöden, användarbehov och tekniska beroenden.
* Trivs i ett högt tempo med mycket samarbete och frihet under ansvar.
* Vill jobba i ett team där du får växa både tekniskt och i ansvar.

**Det här gör rollen extra rolig:**


* Du bygger lösningar som påverkar hela vår affär – i realtid.
* Du får kombinera techintresset med sport och retail.
* Du ingår i ett team med högt tempo, mycket skratt och ständig utveckling.
* Du får möjlighet att bredda dig mot frontend och fullstack – i takt med din egen nyfikenhet.
* Du är med och formar hur vi jobbar – både tekniskt och metodiskt.

**Välkommen till INTERSPORT Tech. Vi bygger smart, vi bygger tillsammans – och vi bygger för verkligheten och framtiden.**

title: Lead Developer/Lead Engineer
description:
At Proposales, we're on a mission to shape the future of business proposals, replacing static documents by defining a new online standard fully powered by web technology (literally, a piece of internet infrastructure).


Read about our mission: https://mission.proposales.com  

(this page is created from scratch by Peter, Design Engineer)  

  

We're looking for a truly gifted Lead Developer/Engineer to join our Product team. This is a unique opportunity to bring your passion and ideas to a fast-growing tech company, to further develop the limitless possibilities of the Proposales’ platform.

**You will form a "Duo" together with an extraordinary product designer, and together you will be responsible from the initial shaping (of how to design/build something new) to deploying it to Production.** We are inspired by the "Shape up" process from 37signals.


Joining a company early is exciting, not only will you be part of defining the vision, as one of our first employees, you will receive a competitive package, including a stock option program, personal training budget, and much more.

**Your mission:**

  

* Write testable, maintainable and scalable code and always with a quality mindset
* Continuously optimise and iterate on your ideas and solutions, and always strive for even better performance and user experience
* Be ready to embrace new technologies and paradigms as we move Proposales into a serverless era
* Join us in shaping our engineering culture to make Proposales a place you look forward to in the morning

**What we believe in:**


We use a serverless, continuous-delivery infrastructure hosted on Vercel, built using Next.js and written in TypeScript.


When deciding on a tech stack for a new sub-project, we usually take the opportunity to assess new tech early and plan for long-term benefits and maintainability over short-term goals. But we also value simple solutions over smart ones, and embrace test-driven development and pair programming, favoring higher code quality over faster development times.


We generally prefer a functional programming style over object-orientation and like to avoid abstractions like middlewares or ORMs.


We prefer monorepos with multiple smaller projects, instead of one monolithic application. We avoid code duplication by extracting core logic and UI into separate internal libraries.

**Some of the technologies you would be working with:**

* Javascript
* React
* Node.js
* Next.js
* TypeScript
* PostgreSQL
* Vercel

**A bit about you:**

* Strong coding ability in Javascript
* Experience with advanced JavaScript libraries and frameworks
* Experience with API and product development
* You are great to collaborate with
* You believe in code quality through code reviews, pair programming and test-driven development
* You believe in self-management and clear communication over processes
* Willingness to learn new technologies and move between different tech stacks
* Working proficiency and communication skills in verbal and written English
* Based in Stockholm and don't mind spending 3 days a week at the office with colleagues

title: Application Developer
description:
Vi söker dig som är senior i rollen som systemutvecklare och som trivs med att arbeta självständigt eller i små team, nära beställaren mot tydliga mål och leveranser.

**Om oss**  

På CityMail spelar IT en central roll för hela verksamheten. IT-avdelningen består av två delar, IT-Utveckling samt IT-Drift och support.


IT-Utveckling består idag av fem utvecklare som är ansvariga för att utveckla och integrera mellan de flesta av CityMails system. Gruppen består av två databasutvecklare och tre systemutvecklare, och levererar skräddarsydda IT-lösningar till alla delar av organisationen, för att förbättra och effektivisera CityMails verksamhet.


IT Drift och Support består av två tekniker som sköter om servrar, nätverk, telefoni samt ger support till resten av företaget när det gäller IT-relaterade frågor.


Våra system används i första hand av våra medarbetare, och är till för att förenkla och möjliggöra vår verksamhet. De system vi utvecklar idag är till för att hantera de flöden av brev och paket som vi levererar från våra kunder till mottagare, med funktioner som att spåra paketen i leveranskedjan, se till att vår personal kan rapportera att ett paket är utdelat, organisera mottagare och hantera information om var personer bor, med mera.


Vi har även system som är riktade mot externa användare, till exempel att våra kunder kan lämna information om de brev och paket som vi ska leverera, hämta tillbaka information om leveranser, samt system där mottagarna av paket kan beställa till extra tjänster för leveransen.

**Om rollen**


Som systemutvecklare hos oss har du en bred roll och kommer vara involverad i alla olika faser vid utvecklingen av CityMails system, till exempel design, utveckling och felsökning.


All nyutveckling sker i Microsofts Azure miljö med hjälp av C#, .NET och Angular. Som databas använder vi Microsofts SQL Server. Vi använder funktioner i Azure som t ex App Services, Function Apps, Service Buses, Storage Accounts, mm, samt använder Azure DevOps för kravhantering och Continuous Integration and Deployment.


Våra systemutvecklare arbetar tätt tillsammans med vår Kvalitet- och Utvecklingsavdelning, som ansvarar för att ta fram kravställningar för utvecklingsprojekt, samt göra kvalitetstester av de utvecklade systemen. I rollen ingår även en del kontakter med slutanvändare av systemen.

**Din profil**


Vi söker dig som har:

* minst 5 års erfarenhet av att arbeta som systemutvecklare
* gedigen erfarenhet av C#, .NET och Azure miljön
* relevant akademisk utbildning
* erfarenhet av felsökning i komplexa IT-miljöer
* erfarenhet att jobba som full-stackutvecklare
* goda kunskaper i svenska

**Det är även meriterande om du har:**

* kunskapar i SQL
* kunskaper i YAML (Azure Pipelines) och ARM templates
* kunskaper och erfarenhet av Angular
* erfarenhet från företag inom transportdelen av e-handelsbranschen

  

**Vi erbjuder dig:**

* delaktighet i intressanta projekt i ett mycket kompetent team som har roligt på jobbet
* möjligheter för dig att växa professionellt som specialist inom Microsoft-teknik
* en platt organisation där dina egna insatser syns och gör skillnad
* en öppen och positiv atmosfär med bra gemenskap där möjligheterna till personlig utveckling är goda
* goda möjligheter att kombinera arbete med privatliv
  

**Välkommen med din ansökan**


Urval och intervjuer sker löpande, vilket innebär att tjänsten kan komma att tillsättas innan ansökningstiden har gått ut. Annonsen kan därför tas bort tidigare än angivet.  

  

*Vi undanber oss kontakt från rekryterings- och bemanningsföretag i samband med denna rekrytering.*

title: Fullstack developer
description:
We now have a new requirement and are looking for a consultant colleague with the qualifications listed below. The position is part of our consulting business, which means you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments.
   

  

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*
**Role**
 The team work with business development and regulatory compliance to make these processes as customer friendly and efficient as possible. You will work in an agile development team together with other developers, business analysts and testers. The team work with modern technology and is responsible for our party assesment within our customer processes. As product for that we use e.g Fen-X from Fenergo so if you have experience with that system, it’s to prefer.
   

  

**Essential Requirements**
* At least 5+ years of experience with software development in a broad range of technologies, it’s a must to have experience from working in Java (17), Springboot (3), REST, Web client, Spring Security, JSON, GraphQL, .Net, Angular, JavaScript, TypeScript,
* Experience in event-oriented message frameworks such as Kafka or similar
* Experience in building REST APIs
* Experience in delivering well-tested, maintainable, and functioning code
* Familiar with GIT, Maven, SonarQube, Github Actions, Openshift.
* Experience in setting up continuous integration pipelines and deployment automation.
* Good communication, understanding business requirements and able to collaborate with other teams with focus on accuracy and timely delivery are the essence of our daily work.
* Self-driven and have a pro-active approach. Possess strong analytical and logical skills.
* Skilled in working in Agile development team.


**Last day to apply** 
 : 14-04-2025
   

  

**About Us**
 We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.
   

  

 Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?
   

  

 We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.
   

  

 🌟 A secure monthly salary – together we’ll agree on a base salary depending on your assignments.
   

  

 🚗 Company car – we encourage you to choose an electric car for a more sustainable future.
   

  

 💼 Occupational pension and great opportunities for salary conversion.
   

  

 🌴 Vacation – Would you like more than 30 days of vacation, perhaps 60 days?
   

  

 🏥 Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.
   

  

 📚 Skills development – you set your own budget and choose the training you wish to attend.
   

  

 🕑 Quality of life – Are you struggling to balance everyday life and wish to work a little less while still earning as much, if not more?
   

  

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*

title: Frontend Developer
description:

 I'm working with a super forward-thinking startup in Stockholm who are now entering an exciting growth phase with plenty of new development in the works and scope to scale the product!
 



  





 They are looking to bring in an experienced frontend developer on a permanent basis in Stockholm!
 



  





**As a Senior Frontend Engineer, you will:** 




  




* Continually build and optimize the product & application to ensure scalability and incredible user experience
* work as part of a talented team of engineers & product leads to have a direct and meaningful contribution

title: Software Engineer
description:
**Why Join Us?**
 At Tobii Dynavox, we empower people with disabilities to do what they once did or never thought possible. We call this mission Power to Be You. Our assistive communication technology helps our customers express themselves, connect with the world, and pursue independence, whether through everyday activities like ordering food or extraordinary feats like running a company. Working at Tobii Dynavox, you’ll become part of a team that spans the globe, with offices in the US, Sweden, France, the UK, China, and beyond.
   

  

 To learn more about what we make possible, meet some of our customers or take a look at some of our solutions.
   

  

 We’re at an exciting stage in our journey—growing rapidly and expanding our Product & Development team in Stockholm to build a vibrant hub for innovation, product design, and technology. This is a unique opportunity to join a thriving organization where you can help shape the future of assistive communication, defining how we work and delivering impactful solutions for our users.
   

  

 We are building a culture of empowered, collaborative teams who are passionate about helping individuals with disabilities find their voice and connect with the world. Our teams thrive on trust, collaboration, and a positive environment where everyone lead and contributes. We deeply understand the people we serve, empathize with their challenges, and use our expertise to make a real difference.
   

  

**About the Role:**
 As a Software Engineer, you will be responsible for developing, maintaining, and improving a widely used Windows-based application that serves thousands of users. This role involves enhancing existing features, resolving technical issues, optimizing performance, and contributing to the long-term sustainability of the software.
   

  

 The ideal candidate is passionate about Windows desktop application development and is eager to explore modern technologies that can enhance the platform. You will work closely with senior engineers and cross-functional teams to address bug reports, improve build and deployment processes, and ensure high-quality software development through best coding practices. A strong commitment to quality, problem-solving, and continuous improvement is essential. A proactive mindset, strong problem-solving skills, and a drive for innovation are essential to success in this role.
   

  

 In this role, you will:
   

  

* Maintain and Improve Existing Software – Develop, refine, and enhance the current software to ensure performance, scalability, and long-term maintainability.
* Identify and Resolve Issues – Debug, troubleshoot, and fix software defects while optimizing code for better efficiency and user experience.
* Enhance Build and Deployment Processes – Contribute to improving the build, deployment, and release workflows to streamline software delivery.
* Collaborate with Cross-Functional Teams – Work closely with product managers, QA engineers, and other developers to address bug reports, implement improvements, and refine features.
* Ensure Code Quality and Best Practices – Follow internal coding standards, participate in code reviews, and maintain documentation to support high-quality development.
* Provide Ongoing Technical Support – Assist in troubleshooting and resolving production issues to maintain software reliability and minimize downtime.
* Proactively Innovate and Solve Problems – Take initiative in identifying areas for improvement, proposing innovative solutions, and contributing to the overall success of the software.


**What We're Looking For:**
* Bachelor’s degree in computer science, related technical field, or equivalent practical experience required
* 2-5 years of development experience in C# and experience in C++
* Strong background in software development, especially on Windows desktop applications
* Experience in Azure DevOps
* Experience in developing large desktop applications
* Ability to focus on delivering customer value, while optimizing architecture
* Experience in modernizing legacy desktop application
* Experience in Scrum or other Agile processes
* Familiarity / interest in automated testing paradigms, especially desktop applications.
* Ability to collaborate with different stakeholders


**Our Values:**
 At Tobii Dynavox, our mission guides what we do, and our values guide us in how we do it. Across the organization, we are committed to being Collaborative, Considerate, Curious and Courageous. We build a trusting environment where every team member prioritizes our customers with empathy and insight. Bold ideas and learning lead to impactful solutions. Driven by curiosity, we continuously challenge the status quo to create meaningful, customer-focused solutions for our customers.
   

  

**What We Offer:**
 At Tobii Dynavox, we believe in empowering individuals – including our employees - to reach their full potential. Here’s what makes us unique:
   

  

* Purpose-Driven Work: Join a company that transforms lives by giving a voice to those with communication challenges. Every day, your work makes a meaningful and concrete impact.
* “Yes, and...” Flexibility: Build a rewarding career AND enjoy time with loved ones. We offer flexible work options so you don’t have to choose between personal and professional goals.
* Growth and Development: Whether you’re advancing your skills or growing your career, we invest in your future with training, learning opportunities, and internal growth paths.
* Inclusive and Supportive Culture: Work in a collaborative, caring environment where diversity and individuality are valued. You’ll feel connected to both your team and our global community.
* A Global Leader with Heart: Be part of an innovative, forward-thinking company that combines experience and cutting-edge solutions with a mission to change lives.

title: Software Engineer (.NET Core) - Hybrid - Stockholm Or Malmö Or Madrid
description:
**About Sinch**
 Sinch is pioneering the way the world communicates. More than 150,000 businesses — including Google, Uber, Paypal, Visa, Tinder, and many others — rely on Sinch's Customer Communications Cloud to power engaging customer experiences through mobile messaging, voice, and email.
   

  

 Whether you need to verify users or craft omnichannel campaigns, Sinch makes it easy. Our AI-infused Super Network, APIs, and applications ensure you can connect with your customers reliably and securely, at every step of their journey.
   

  

 At Sinch we "Dream Big", "Win Together", "Keep it simple", and "Make it Happen". These values are our foundation!
   

  

**Description**
 We are a forward-thinking team creating cutting-edge, cloud-based communication solutions. Our backend systems leverage the latest C# and .NET Core technologies, deployed in Kubernetes on AWS. We thrive on collaboration, innovation, and crafting scalable, reliable systems that power seamless communication worldwide.
   

  

 This role is a hybrid role and is open to candidates located in Stockholm or Malmo or Madrid.
   

  

 If you're a Software Engineer with a passion for problem-solving, clean code, and modern DevOps practices, we'd love to have you on our team.
   

  

**Role**
 As a Software Engineer, you'll take ownership of developing and maintaining high-performing backend systems while contributing to all stages of the software lifecycle. In this role, you will:
   

  

* Develop scalable and resilient distributed systems using C# and .NET Core.
* Work closely with engineers, DevOps specialists, and product managers in an agile, cross-functional team.
* Build and maintain applications running on Kubernetes, actively monitor production systems, and ensure reliability.
* Leverage AWS tools and services to deploy, optimize, and scale cloud-based systems.
* Write clean, testable, and maintainable code, with a focus on system performance and scalability.
* Enhance automation, streamline CI/CD pipelines, and troubleshoot issues proactively.
* Influence architectural decisions and actively contribute to enhancing our development and operational practices.


**Requirements**
* Major professional experience building and maintaining backend systems in production.
* Expertise in C#, .NET Core, and developing distributed systems.
* Solid understanding of DevOps principles and experience with CI/CD pipelines.
* Strong communication skills and a collaborative mindset.
* A passion for clean, testable code and modern software practices.


**Good to have**
* Service-oriented architecture and microservices.
* Relational and NoSQL databases (e.g., MySQL, MSSQL, Redis).
* Hands-on experience with Kubernetes and AWS.
* Incident response and on-call rotations.
* Proficiency in additional programming languages such as C++, Python, or Kotlin
* Experience with Asterisk and VoIP protocols, preferably SIP.


 Embrace the challenge and join us! You will have the chance to:
   

  

* Work with a talented and diverse team in a culture that values innovation and collaboration.
* Take on meaningful challenges and grow with the latest technologies.
* Enjoy flexibility with hybrid work options and a healthy work-life balance.
* Benefit from competitive salaries and a comprehensive benefits package, including healthcare insurance, pension contributions, and wellness allowance.


**Our Hiring Process**
 We are committed to ensuring a recruitment process that is fair, objective, consistent, and inclusive. Our approach includes structured, competency-based interviews designed to evaluate your skills, experience, and qualifications relevant to the role. At times, we may include a data-driven assessment to enhance our hiring success and identify candidates likely to excel.
   

  

 We believe in a two-way process and encourage you to ask questions throughout the journey. If this role isn't what you're looking for, please explore the other opportunities listed on our career page: . No matter who you are, we hope you find an exciting path forward - hopefully with us!
   

  

 Please send your application in English language. Thank you!

title: Software Engineer
description:
Bannerflow is a hyper-growth company and one of Europe's most exciting SaaS companies. We build a Creative Management Platform that allows enterprise brands to create, publish, analyze, and optimize advertising in-house, at scale and across advertising channels.
   

  

 Our agile teams are highly autonomous, collaborative and we are now looking for yet another passionate engineer to join us!
   

  

 ⭐ Ready for a new challenge? Here is what we offer.
   

  

* Flexible & autonomous teams, built upon trust. Together, we decide how to win. We trust, assume the best in others, and respect the individual, which we believe is the foundation of our great engineering culture. Our teams consistently score high in motivation and engagement measurements. We believe in close collaboration and communication, within and outside of the team.
* New challenges and personal growth. We live by our entrepreneurial spirit, this means taking risks, identifying opportunities and always seeking new solutions.
* A passionate and fun culture. We are passionate about our work and believe that having lots of fun is essential for both creativity and success. Welcome to a diverse and inclusive workplace, with a lot of fun and exciting activities going on including hackathons, team activities, company trips and board game nights.
* A stable and global industry-leader based in Stockholm, expanding and scaling to new markets! We’re in a great position to drive success and seize new opportunities, our international customer base is constantly growing and so is our product. With the support of our new owners, we are making moves to expand into new markets, setting a clear course for growth in 2025.
* Constantly evolving tech and modern tooling. Our creative management platform serves 500+ million impressions every day (with a record of over 1 billion). We are constantly looking to improve our product and tech. Do you have ideas on how we can scale even faster? Bring them on!


**🥁** 
 What tech makes you heart beat?
   

  

**Our Ever Evolving Tech Stack Currently Consists Of**
* TypeScript / Angular
* C# / .NET
* MongoDB
* Azure & Kubernetes
* …and some more stuff


 🦋 Are you + Bannerflow = true?
   

  

 We are seeking an experienced and ambitious engineer to join our team and help us continue to deliver the best possible products to our customers. This role is a critical part of our development team and will play a key role in shaping the direction of our technology and ensuring that our products are robust, scalable and secure.
   

  

 So, what are we looking for?
   

  

* >5 years of experience as a software engineer delivering high-quality products
* Strong sense of ownership and personal drive
* Ability to write clean, efficient, and well-documented code
* Excellent communication, collaboration and leadership skills - paring or mobbing fellow developer is just a natural way of working for you
* Passion for mentoring and coaching team members to help them reach their full potential
* Strong interest of the latest technologies, industry trends and best practices to continually improve our products and processes


 At Bannerflow, we live by our values of passion, collaboration, and challenge. As a Software Engineer you’ll help us continue to revolutionize the Ad Tech industry through cutting-edge technology and product excellence. We offer a hybrid workplace and a competitive compensation package including pension according to ITP1, health allowance, parental leave top-up, and health care insurance. We are committed to building a diverse and inclusive team and welcome applications from candidates of all backgrounds, experiences, and abilities.
   

  

 If you are ready to take your career to the next level, we want to hear from you!

title: Senior Frontend Developer
description:
**Who we are?**
 We Dibbers are passionate travel enthusiasts who want to make travel planning as easy as possible – a few clicks and you are ready to go! We have built a Swedish cutting-edge online platform to streamline and digitalize the travel experience for companies, individual travelers and wanderlust groups. We are an innovative team who moves the limits and who loves to celebrate success!
   

  

 We are thrilled to announce an exciting opportunity for a talented
 **Senior** 
 Frontend Developer to join our team! Our passion for travel is what drives us, and we are looking for someone who shares that same enthusiasm. As our new
 **Senior** 
**Frontend Developer** 
 based in Stockholm, you will play a key role in architecting and developing our all-in-one platform. If you’re ready to join us on our quest to create a state-of-the-art platform and help people explore the world, let’s connect and discuss how you can make a difference.
   

  

 What do we need?
   

  

* 4+ years of experience in frontend development
* Strong proficiency in JavaScript and/or TypeScript
* Expertise in Angular, React, or both
* Experience integrating frontend applications with backend REST APIs
* Hands-on experience with frontend test automation (e.g., Jest, Cypress, Playwright, Selenium, etc.)

* Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, agile environment


**What You’ll Do**
* Contribute to frontend architecture discussions and ensure best practices are followed

* Work closely with backend developers to integrate REST APIs
* Optimize applications for speed, usability, and cross-browser compatibility
* Collaborate with designers to bring UI/UX visions to life
* Stay up to date with the latest frontend technologies and trends


**What’s awesome about working at DIB?**
* Be part of a rapidly growing company with the opportunity to influence the development of our platform
* Hybrid working policy
* 30 days of annual leave
* A nice and social office in a great central location
* We prioritize your growth and development, offering training and education opportunities

title: Senior Software Engineer
description:
Bokio is on a mission to make the world a better place for small businesses. We want to make it super easy for everyone to run a business through automation of financial services, accounting, payments and taxes. We’re looking to strengthen and grow our Bank team. The Bank team is at the core of Bokio’s strategy in 2025. They are responsible for bank integrations, and develop services and features that diversify and enhance Bokio’s offer, aiming to deliver a trustful and complete bank solution for small businesses.
   

  

 Sounds exciting? Join us and help us make an already awesome product even better!
   

  

**More details can be found below, but in a nutshell:**
* We are a cross-functional team (consisting of Engineers, a Product Manager, a Product Designer, and supported by an Engineering Manager), collaborating directly with other teams as well as external partners
* Our team is split between multiple locations in Sweden (mainly Gothenburg and Stockholm), and as such, communication and collaboration are things we care a lot about and do really well
* We enjoy a large amount of creative freedom in solving challenges, with clear directions and ownership of our area
* Our tech stack is centered around .NET, C#, React/TypeScript/CSS.
* We are an open and diverse team that welcomes contributions and new ideas in software development, architecture, technical leadership and ways of working
* Our ways of working are based on Agile principles


**Who you are**
* You care about users and improving their experience
* You are curious and are looking for ways to improve and learn
* You enjoy and promote close collaboration with your colleagues, both in the team, as well as across the organization
* You are a good communicator, comfortable with spoken and written English
* You care about and use sound engineering practices to develop stable and maintainable software


**What’s in your backpack**
* You have deep understanding of all the stages in the software development lifecycle, software architectures and providing technical leadership
* You are great with .NET and C#, and comfortable with React, Html, CSS and Typescript/Javascript


**It’s considered a bonus if:**
* You have worked either in a Tech Lead role, as a Software Architect or have been a mentor
* You have worked with customer-critical applications where information security was important
* You have/had your own company, and understand the perils of running a small business
* You are familiar with accounting or fintech


**What we have to offer**
* A diverse workplace, with skilled and kind people from all over the world
* A community of 5000+ Product Development professionals in fellow companies of Visma Group with active guilds in Software Engineering, AI/ML, Cyber Security, Product Design, Product Management etc.
* We invest in your growth and learning by weekly dedicated learning time, training budget, learning platforms etc.
* Flexible working hours and freedom to work in hybrid-remote setup
* Awesome offices in central Gothenburg & Stockholm 30 days vacation, comprehensive wellness grant, pension according to ITP levels and other benefits.


**About Bokio**
 Bokio makes it super easy for everyone to run a business through automation of financial services, accounting, payments and taxes. We make sure our users understand their finances and have the right tools to make the best decisions for their businesses.
   

  

 You are welcome at Bokio for who you are, no matter where you come from or what you look like. Our platform is for everyone, and so is our workplace! We cherish a culture at Bokio where empathy, diversity, respect and courage are front and center. Get a glimpse of what we are up to on our Instagrams: Life at Bokio and Bokio App .
   

  

 Please note that Bokio conducts background screenings as a final part of all employment processes; detailed information will be shared closer upon or per request.

title: SENIOR DEVELOPER
description:
**Senior Developer**
**Scandinavian Airlines’ Loyalty Solutions team at SAS Digital & IT is looking for one Senior Developer to be part of driving our development roadmap within one of our feature teams: EuroBonus Commercial Development.**
 We just started our next exciting chapter of developing the next generation products and services for our more than 8 million EuroBonus members, as well as migrating all our current services from one techstack to another – the nextgen web of SAS.
   

  

 To further accelerate this journey we are looking for 1 Senior Developer to bring further energy, competence and skills to our team.
   

  

**Challenges You Will Work On**
* Support our Digital product owners to plan the team sprints to keep it aligned with our prioritized backlog.
* Take lead in code review for the team of developers working in the feature team, as well as performing pair-programming with more junior developers to help them advance in their development efforts.
* Support Tech lead and other senior developers in the department to analyse and perform solution design of new products and services, as well as refactor current ones.
* Understand needs from business and translate them into working software. This role requires strong communication skills, as you will collaborate closely with various stakeholders across different teams to ensure alignment and successful implementation of solutions.
* Secure application compliance with regulation (GDPR, Accessibility) and SAS IT security.
* Understand when and how to make performance optimizations and trade-offs
* Design architecture and solutions based on MVP model that can scale to enterprise solutions.
* Proactively suggest digital solutions that can help the organization meet its goals
* Be part of our on-call rotation together with our entire DevOps-team securing our services are running stable 24/7.


**To Be Successful, We Believe You Have**
* Strong understanding of how to build modern web applications using JavaScript/TypeScript and libraries/frameworks such as React, Next.js and Node.js. (Web + BFF)
* Experience working with monorepo architectures, including tools like Turborepo, and best practices for scaling and maintainability. (Monorepo + scaling + maintainer)
* A passion for creating and enhancing the developer experience, including building intuitive APIs, improving documentation, and streamlining workflows for developers.
* A passion for proposing and driving change in a complex technical environment, and to share knowledge through demos, presentations, and other forums.
* Comfortable with cloud infrastructure, preferably within Azure.
* Strong familiarity with Agile practices.
* Proficiency in English.
* Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a similar field, or work experience valued equally.
* 5+ years in senior commercial IT-development role(s).


**Beneficial;**
* Experience from developing products and services for a loyalty program, such as other airline loyalty programs, hotel loyalty programs etc.
* Experience from Okta auth0 technology.
* Experience from integration with other vendors and partners to drive product innovation and revenue.
* Experience in CI/CD pipelines, Github, and infrastructure automation.
* Expertise in feature development, with a focus on scalable, maintainable, and accessible solutions.
* Experience working with monorepo workflows, including tooling and best practices that support team collaboration and scalability.


**Why SAS?**
**Benefits**
 At SAS, we offer extensive opportunities for professional development in an international, fast-paced working environment. We are dedicated to the continuous growth of our employees. Working with us comes with a variety of benefits, including:
   

  

* Travel Perks: Enjoy discounted travel opportunities around the world with SAS.
* Health & Wellness: Access to health and wellness benefits, including a newly renovated gym with complimentary classes such as CrossFit and yoga.
* Discounts: Receive discounts from a wide range of brands, as well as on transportation to and from airports, airport shops, hotels, and car rentals.
* Work Environment: Our office location in Frösundavik offers a vibrant workspace with a restaurant, café, and easy access to outdoor activities in Hagaparken and Brunnsviken. Engage in running, tennis, outdoor gym sessions, kayaking, and stand-up paddling with equipment available free of charge.
* Convenient Commute: Benefit from a non-stop bus service connecting our office to Solna station, and commuter trains, alongside a network of cycle paths.


**Other Of Importance**
* Deadline for application: 25/04/2025. Please send us your CV as soon as possible, as interviews are conducted continuously, and the position may be filled before the application deadline. Note that we are not able to handle any applications that are sent by email, due to GDPR.
* Desired startdate: As soon as possible.
* Position: Fulltime (100%) starting with a 6-month probation period.
* This position is based in Frösundavik, Solna (Stockholm), and you will be expected to work onsite. Remote work may also be an option, depending on the agreement made with your manager.
* To be eligible for this position you need a EU-work permit.

title: Sr. Java Developer

title: Full-stack Software Engineer
description:
We’re looking for a well-rounded
 **Full-stack Developer** 
 to join our growing team in
 **Stockholm** 
 – one of our key strategic hubs at ABAX. In this role, you’ll work across both the front- and back-end, contributing to impactful digital experiences used by thousands of customers across Europe. You’ll be joining an ambitious, collaborative team working with a modern tech stack and agile delivery practices.
   

  

 This is an opportunity to shape scalable, maintainable solutions that are both user-friendly and robust under the hood. As part of an international product team, you’ll collaborate with peers in Sweden, Poland, and across the Nordics to deliver value fast – with room to grow and innovate.
   

  

 If you’re passionate about crafting end-to-end solutions and thrive in cross-functional environments, we’d love to hear from you.
   

  

**What You’ll Be Doing**
* Designing, developing, and maintaining scalable web applications using JavaScript frameworks and backend technologies (.NET).
* Writing clean, modular code with a focus on performance, security, and testability across the full stack.
* Working closely with UX/UI designers, product owners, and fellow engineers to ship high-quality features.
* Supporting API development, database design, and infrastructure-as-code initiatives.
* Participating in code reviews, CI/CD pipelines, and containerized deployments (Docker, Kubernetes, GitLab).


**What We’re Looking For**
* 3+ years of experience as a full-stack developer, with proven capabilities on both frontend and backend.
* Proficiency with HTML5/CSS3, and TypeScript/JavaScript.
* Experience working with backend technologies such as .NET Core and relational/non-relational databases.
* Familiarity with cloud platforms (GCP, AWS) and DevOps practices.
* A proactive mindset with strong collaboration and communication skills.


**Nice to Have**
* Experience with microservices architecture, RESTful APIs, and messaging systems like RabbitMQ.
* Understanding of modern software patterns.
* Knowledge of security best practices, frontend performance optimization, and observability tooling.
* Exposure to real-time data flows and large-scale system integrations.


**The ABAX Way**
 At ABAX, our values guide how we work:
   

  

* Innovative – We stay curious and open to new solutions.
* Enthusiastic – We bring positive energy to what we do.
* Sustainable – We care about people and long-term impact.
* Customer-Centric – We always put the customer first.


**Other Details**
* Start date: As soon as possible
* Location: Stockholm, Sweden
* Work extent: Full-time
* Language: English (written & spoken fluency required)
* Work setup: Hybrid role based in Stockholm. We’re looking for candidates already residing in or near the Stockholm area who can join us in the office at least two days per week.


**Equal Opportunities**
 At ABAX, we are dedicated to creating an inclusive environment for all our colleagues. This commitment extends to ensuring that our recruitment practices and processes are as inclusive as possible. We encourage applicants from all backgrounds to join us in strengthening our focus on equality and diversity in the workplace.
   

  

**About ABAX**
 ABAX is a leading European telematics IoT platform offering connected mobility solutions for vehicle tracking, tool tracking, and equipment control. Our mission is to deliver mobility data insights that empowers people to do more with less.
   

  

 With over 500,000 tracked assets and 40,000 customers, ABAX delivers reliable and powerful solutions for businesses relying on physical operations. Our advanced platform transforms customer needs into actionable insights and automated reporting, driving efficiency and operational excellence.
   

  

 We operate across Europe, with over 350 employees working from our facilities in Norway, Sweden, Denmark, Finland, the Netherlands, Belgium, Poland, and the UK. Our Head Office is in Larvik, Norway.

title: Frontend engineer with focus on UI library design
description:
**About the job** 




 Are you interested in taking the next big step in your career and to help the leading Open Data company in Sweden expand? MetaSolutions is looking to strengthen their core team in delivering the best and innovative Open Data platform in the world. Is frontend development and helping out to redesign a successful javascript UI library your cup of tea? Then look no further!
 



  





**What will you do?** 




 You will work in a dedicated team alongside the founders of the company. Your primary job responsibilities will consist of redesigning and developing a UI library used to drive part of our customers' websites. You will also contribute to our Open Source libraries as well as help out with our main application EntryScape.
 



  





 As part of our team, you will have many opportunities to grow, pushing the boundaries of modern JavaScript, take on complex data workflow challenges or even lead the way in front-end development of Semantic Web and Linked Data. You will work together closely with your fellow co-workers daily, performing agile methods and techniques such as code reviews and pair programming to improve our modular applications. You will also have daily dev-syncs with your team regarding internal and external requirements and demands to our product.
 



  





**Who are you?** 




 To truly thrive in your role here at MetaSolutions we believe that you are a driven person that enjoys being in charge of your own projects. You also have an open mindset, adaptability to change and new work demands, as well as being a team player. If JavaScript, Open Source, Open Data and Open Standards interest you then you will fit in perfectly in your role as frontend developer.
 



  





**Skills and requirements:** 



* Development experience in client-side JavaScript
* Experience with one or several JavaScript frameworks
* Knowledge of HTML & CSS
* REST APIs, good knowledge of HTTP
* Understanding of accessibility according to WCAG requirements
* Ability to communicate fluently in English



  





 In addition to the skills and requirements listed above, the following skills will make you extremely irresistible:
 


* Experience with developing plugins / extensions in existing javascript frameworks
* Experience with code bundlers like Webpack or Rollup
* A good eye for design
* Knowledge of Semantic Web / Linked Data technology stack
* Ability to communicate in European languages, for example Swedish/German/French/Spanish/Italian



  





**What can we offer you?** 




 At MetaSolutions we work with the latest technologies and quality equipment. You have the possibility to work both remote and at our office, as well as flexible work hours. We consist of an international team of different languages and nationalities as we strive for diversity in our workplace. Our office is centrally located in Stockholm, with a beautiful view of the lake Mälaren.
 



 Besides everything we have listed above other benefits and perks consists of:
 


* Generous training and wellness allowance
* Free yearly health checks
* Company bike you can use
* Company events like ice skating, hiking, canoeing etc
* Allowance for a JS conference
* Swedish language courses if you need it



  





 Submit your application today, selection and interviews are ongoing.
 



  





 MetaSolutions is a company based in Sweden, dedicated to innovative solutions for advanced data management by interlinking information using semantic technologies. Our vision is to be a leading company in supporting advanced data management processes using our product EntryScape (entryscape.com).
 



  





 MetaSolutions is a spin-off from a leading research group at the Royal Institute of Technology in Stockholm (KTH).

title: Senior Backend Developer
description:
*Are you a Senior Backend Developer who thrives in a collaborative, product-focused team? With a renewed strategy and leadership team, aimed at strengthening our market position, we are growing our tech department in Stockholm. This is your chance to make a real impact by contributing to shaping our business success. We are looking for developers who want to join us on our transformation journey and are eager to embrace the shift toward product-based development.*
**Get an idea of the role**
 In the role as a Senior Backend Developer at Resurs, you’ll be part of a small end-to-end product team, collaborating closely with business stakeholders to build and enhance solutions that truly matter. The focus is on context, not just specific technologies or platforms. It is about making a real impact in a business-oriented setting and sharing the responsibility for success.
   

  

**On a personal level**
 We believe you have experience of building software for products that have reached production and maintenance stages. With a passion for solving real business challenges and delivering tangible outcomes, you bring both energy and curiosity to your work. You also have excellent communication skills in both Swedish and English, with a strong interest in both the big picture and the finer details.
   

  

*On a technical level, we believe you have solid experience in:*
* Typescript/Javascript, Cloud Native
* Infrastructure-as-code, e.g. AWS CDK or Terraform
* CI/CD, e.g. Github Actions/Code Pipeline
* Serverless, e.g. Lambda/Functions, SQS/PubSub, Kinesis/Dataflow, DynamoDb/CosmosDb
* DevOps (in the sense of 'you build it, you run it', from start to finish)


 Having experience in a startup environment, with knowledge of concepts such as CQRS, DDD, TDD, SOLID, and Five Whys, as well as working in contexts influenced by regulatory requirements, would be an advantage.
   

  

**Important information**
 On final candidates, we carry out a detailed background check via an external company
   

  

**More than a job**
*Resurs is a leading bank in the Nordics with a simple philosophy: we want to create balance in people’s personal finances. On that foundation, we develop offers and services within loans, savings and payments for retail and e-commerce that are based on people’s everyday lives, and that will create long-term value for our customers. And for society. Today, we have a customer base of slightly more than 6 million customers and around 650 employees in the Nordic region.*
**Apply today!**
 Don’t wait to send in your application - selection, and interviews take place on an ongoing basis and the position may be filled before the last advertising date. We look forward to hearing from you!
   

  

* In this recruitment process, the supplier is solely responsible for the personal data they collect and process. Resurs is solely responsible for the personal data processed by us in the recruitment process.


 Resurs has more than 40 years of experience in retail finance and is one of the leading niche banks in the Nordics. We help companies and private individuals with lending, savings and payments. Today, we have a customer base of slightly more than 6 million customers and around 650 employees in the Nordic region.
   

  

 Follow us on Instagram:
   

  

 Resurs.Sverige
   

  

 Resurs.Norge
   

  

 Resurs.Suomi
   

  

 Resurs.Danmark

title: Software Design Engineer
description:
**Welcome!**
 Our Growth is Creating Great Opportunities!
   

  

 Our team is expanding, and we want to hire the most talented people we can. Continued success depends on it! Once you've had a chance to explore our current open positions, apply to the ones you feel suit you best and keep track of both your progress in the selection process, and new postings that might interest you!
   

  

 Thanks for your interest in working on our team!
   

  

 We are currently looking for a highly motivated
 **Software Design Engineer** 
 to join our Research and Development team in Stockholm, Sweden. If you want to be a part of our growing company that is driven by innovation and is focused on building a future together with our employees, consider applying.
   

  

 The key responsibilities of this role will include
   

  

* Design, implementation and test of hardware abstraction middleware and APIs
* Design, implementation and test of embedded software
* Design, implementation and test of forwarding plane software for switch and router functionality
* Documenting the design via Design Specifications and Reference Manuals


**General**
 Knowledge, skills and experience required
   

  

* Professional background in software development, preferably from large scale C/C++ development. End to end experience with designing, coding, testing, and maintaining code.

* Experience with build and test systems, continuous integration (Jenkins, Buildbot, or similar), scripting (Python, Bash) and source control systems (preferably Git). Understanding of the value and usage of unit testing, test automation, and code generation.


**Required**

**Desirable**
